verses.verse: These are the <S%H1697>words<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> in the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H5489>Suph,<s%> between <S%H6290>Paran,<s%> and <S%H8603>Tophel,<s%> and <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> and <S%H2698>Hazeroth,<s%> and <S%H1774>Dizahab.<s%>
It is <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' journey from <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> to Kadesh <S%H6947>Barnea.<s%>

It happened in the <S%H705>fortieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> according to all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had given him in commandment to <S%H6680>them;<s%>

<S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H6252>Ashtaroth,<s%> at <S%H154>Edrei.<s%>
<S%H5676>Beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H2974>began<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H874>declare<s%> this <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to us in <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> You have <S%H3427>lived<s%> long <S%H7227>enough<s%> in this <S%H2022>mountain:<s%>

<S%H6437>turn,<s%> and take your <S%H5265>journey,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and to all the places <S%H7934>near<s%> <S%H6160>there,<s%> in the Arabah, in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H8219>country,<s%> and in the lowland, and in the <S%H5045>South,<s%> and by <S%H3220>the<s%> <S%H2348>seashore,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> as far as the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river,<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates.<s%>

<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H935>you:<s%> go in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to them and to their <S%H2233>seed<s%> after <S%H310>them.<s%>"
I <S%H559>spoke<s%> to you at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "I am not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> you myself <S%H905>alone:<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H3117>you,<s%> and behold, you are this day as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> make you a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> as many <S%H3254>as<s%> you <S%H1288>are,<s%> and bless <S%H1696>you,<s%> as he has promised you!
<S%H349>How<s%> can I myself alone <S%H5375>bear<s%> your <S%H2960>encumbrance,<s%> and your <S%H4853>burden,<s%> and your <S%H7379>strife?<s%>

<S%H3051>Take<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H995>understanding<s%> and well <S%H3045>known<s%> according to your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> them heads over <S%H7218>you.<s%>"
You <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H559>me,<s%> and said, "The <S%H1697>thing<s%> which you have <S%H559>spoken<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H6213>do.<s%>"

So I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H3045>known,<s%> and <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H7218>heads<s%> over <S%H8269>you,<s%> captains of <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H2572>fifties,<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H6235>tens,<s%> and <S%H7860>officers,<s%> according to your <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>

I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H8199>judges<s%> at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8085>"Hear<s%> cases between your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H6664>righteously<s%> between a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and the foreigner who is living with <S%H1616>him.<s%>

You shall not <S%H6440>show<s%> <S%H5234>partiality<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> you shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6996>small<s%> and the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1481>alike;<s%> you shall not be afraid of the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H376>man;<s%> for the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%>'s. The <S%H1697>case<s%> that is too <S%H7185>hard<s%> for <S%H7126>you,<s%> you shall bring to <S%H8085>me,<s%> and I will hear it."
I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you at that <S%H6256>time<s%> all the <S%H1697>things<s%> which you should <S%H6213>do.<s%>

We <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> and went <S%H3212>through<s%> all that <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> which you <S%H7200>saw,<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H935>us;<s%> and we came to Kadesh <S%H6947>Barnea.<s%>
I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H935>you,<s%> "You have come to the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> gives to <S%H5414>us.<s%>

<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5927>you:<s%> go up, take <S%H3423>possession,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H3372>you;<s%> don't be afraid, neither be <S%H2865>dismayed.<s%>"

You came <S%H7126>near<s%> to me everyone of <S%H559>you,<s%> and said, "Let us <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2658>us,<s%> that they may search the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H7725>us,<s%> and bring us <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%> by which we must go <S%H5927>up,<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> to which we shall <S%H935>come.<s%>"
The <S%H1697>thing<s%> pleased me <S%H3190>well;<s%> and I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H259>you,<s%> one <S%H582>man<s%> for every <S%H376>tribe:<s%>
and they <S%H6437>turned<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H935>country,<s%> and came to the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> and spied it <S%H7270>out.<s%>

They <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> in their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and brought it <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7725>us,<s%> and brought us <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> gives to <S%H5414>us.<s%>"
Yet you <S%H14>wouldn't<s%> go <S%H5927>up,<s%> but <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%>

and you <S%H7279>murmured<s%> in your <S%H168>tents,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8135>hated<s%> <S%H3318>us,<s%> he has brought us forth out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> us into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> to destroy <S%H8045>us.<s%>

Where are we going <S%H5927>up?<s%> our <S%H251>brothers<s%> have made our <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H4549>melt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5971><s%> 'The people are <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H7311>taller<s%> than <S%H5892>we;<s%> the cities are <S%H1419>great<s%> and fortified <S%H1219>up<s%> to the <S%H8064>sky;<s%> and moreover we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the Anakim <S%H6062>there.<s%>'"
Then I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6206>you,<s%> "Don't dread, neither be afraid of <S%H3372>them.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> who <S%H1980>goes<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3898>you,<s%> he will fight for <S%H6213>you,<s%> according to all that he did for you in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%>

and in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> where you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> how that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5375>bore<s%> <S%H376>you,<s%> as a man does <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> in all the <S%H1870>way<s%> that you <S%H1980>went,<s%> until you <S%H935>came<s%> to this <S%H4725>place.<s%>"
Yet in this <S%H1697>thing<s%> you <S%H539>didn't<s%> believe <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%>

who <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> to seek you <S%H8446>out<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> to pitch your <S%H2583>tents<s%> <S%H784>in,<s%> in fire by <S%H3915>night,<s%> to <S%H7200>show<s%> you by what <S%H1870>way<s%> you should <S%H3212>go,<s%> and in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H1697>words,<s%> and was <S%H7107>angry,<s%> and <S%H7650>swore,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Surely not <S%H376>one<s%> of these <S%H582>men<s%> of this <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> which I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%>

<S%H2108>except<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh:<s%> he shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5414>it;<s%> and to him will I give the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he has trodden <S%H1869>on,<s%> and to his <S%H1121>children,<s%> because he has <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"
Also <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with me for your <S%H1558>sakes,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "You also shall not <S%H935>go<s%> in <S%H8033>there:<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> who <S%H5975>stands<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H935>you,<s%> he shall go in <S%H2388>there:<s%> encourage you <S%H3478>him;<s%> for he shall cause Israel to inherit <S%H5157>it.<s%>

Moreover your little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> whom you <S%H559>said<s%> should be a <S%H957>prey,<s%> and your <S%H1121>children,<s%> who this <S%H3117>day<s%> have no <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>evil,<s%> they shall go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H5414>there,<s%> and to them will I give <S%H3423>it,<s%> and they shall possess it.
But as for <S%H6437>you,<s%> turn, and take your <S%H5265>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%>"

Then you <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2398>me,<s%> "We have sinned against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> we will go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H3898>fight,<s%> according to all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H376>us.<s%>" Every man of you <S%H2296>put<s%> on his <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and <S%H1951>presumed<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> into the hill <S%H2022>country.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>me,<s%> "Tell <S%H5927>them,<s%> 'Don't go up, neither <S%H3898>fight;<s%> for I am not <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H5062>you;<s%> lest you be struck <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies.<s%>'"

So I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H8085>you,<s%> and you didn't listen; but you <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and were <S%H2102>presumptuous,<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> <S%H5927>up<s%> into the hill <S%H2022>country.<s%>

The <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in that <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H3318>country,<s%> came out <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H7291>you,<s%> and chased <S%H1682>you,<s%> as bees <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H3807>beat<s%> you down in <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> even to <S%H2767>Hormah.<s%>

You <S%H7725>returned<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> nor gave ear to <S%H238>you.<s%>
So you <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> according to the <S%H3117>days<s%> that you <S%H3427>remained.<s%>
